      • play_again

        public void play_again​(javafx.event.Event event)
        METHOD:play_again Sets values to null, except beginning deck, so the game can begin again.

      • start_game

        public void start_game​(javafx.event.Event event)
        METHOD:start_game This begins game play. Sets up players and decks, and begins a new game of war.
        Parameters:
        event - The deck button was clicked.

      • draw

        public void draw​(javafx.event.Event event)
        METHOD:draw During game play, the player will click their deck to initiate a cycle of card play. Controls the main flow of the game, each draw the player or the computer wins the cards played.
        Parameters:
        event - The player clicked their deck to draw a card.

      • menu

        public void menu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        METHOD: menu Launches the menu (front page) scene. Allows the user to press the menu button to return to the main page of the application.
        Parameters:
        event - The menu button was clicked.
